Player History
Had first career hit (triple) on 4/5/1985, off Dwayne Henry (TEX)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/12/1985, off Bill Krueger (OAK)...
2/2/1986: Gets a new one-year contract worth $350,000 through salary arbitration...
Traded from Seattle to St. Louis on 2/8/1986 (Going to SEA: 3B Paul Molitor. Going to STL: CF Ivan Calderon, P Chuck Cary, P Randy O'Neal, SS Spike Owen)...
2/2/1987: Gets a new one-year contract worth $350,000 through salary arbitration...
2/2/1988: Gets a new one-year contract worth $350,000 through salary arbitration...
Injured on 6/23/1988 with a Pulled Back Muscle, out for one week...
2/2/1989: Gets a new one-year contract worth $635,714 through salary arbitration...
Signed as a free agent by New York (M) on 2/5/1990 to a 2-year deal worth $2,500,000 per year...
Released by New York (M) on 2/6/1990...
Signed as a free agent by St. Louis on 2/8/1990 to a 3-year deal worth $2,500,000 per year...
Injured on 4/21/1991 with a Concussion, out for 1-2 weeks...
Signed as a free agent by St. Louis on 3/3/1993 to a 1-year deal worth $2,343,750 per year...
